info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 4:47PM MDT until October 02 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LEA COUNTY... At 446 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 19 miles west of Jal, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...An observing station in southern Lea County reported a 68 mpg wind gust at 430 PM MDT. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Lea County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
